mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Metanoia Moment exists to capture and preserve testimonies of transformation through Jesus Christ, creating a timeless archive accessible to believers worldwide and for generations to come.

meaning.title: What is Metanoia?
meaning.description: Metanoia (μετάνοια) is a Greek word meaning 'a transformative change of heart.' It represents the profound spiritual transformation that occurs when someone encounters Jesus Christ.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We envision a world where every believer's story is preserved, where the lost can find hope in real testimonies, and where future generations can witness the unchanging power of God.

support.title: Support the Mission
support.subtitle: Help us preserve testimonies for generations
support.description: Metanoia Moment is a ministry dedicated to capturing and sharing stories of faith. Your support helps us maintain the platform, reach more people, and ensure these testimonies endure.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Is the free tier really unlimited?
faq.a1: Yes! You can record unlimited stories, up to 10 minutes each, stored forever at 720p quality. No credit card required, no hidden limits.
faq.q2: What happens to my stories if I cancel?
faq.a2: Your stories are never deleted. If you downgrade from a paid plan, you keep all your content but lose access to premium features like 4K quality and Family Vault.
faq.q3: Can I upgrade or downgrade anytime?
faq.a3: Absolutely. You can change your plan at any time. When upgrading, you get immediate access to new features. When downgrading, your premium features remain until the end of your billing cycle.
faq.q4: What's the difference between Family and Legacy?
faq.a4: Family is for active families who want to collaborate on story preservation. Legacy is for those who want permanent, decentralized backup with physical products like annual USB drives and printed books.
